column1: Estimated resident population by local government area (LGA), Queensland, 1991 to 2019p
r = revised    p = preliminary     (C) = City     (R) = Regional Council     (S) = Shire    (T) = Town

(a) Under the 2017 ASGS, Mesh Block 30225042000 was reallocated from Cook (S) to Lockhart River (S). This accounts for differences in the 2017, 2018 and 2019 estimates between ASGS 2016 and ASGS 2017/2018. Refer to ABS explanatory notes, "Updated Mesh Block Allocation, October 2018", http://www.abs.gov.au/ausstats/abs@.nsf/Lookup/by%20Subject/1270.0.55.003~July%202018~Main%20Features~Local%20Government%20Areas%20(LGAs)~2
(b) Local government area does not sum to Queensland from 1991 to 2000.
Geographies are based on the 2016 edition of the Australian Statistical Geography Standard (ASGS).
Source: ABS 3218.0 - Regional Population Growth, Australia, various editions and Queensland Treasury and Trade estimates.
